attributes.action: Change UK trailer law to bring it in line with the rest of Europe.to alow us to use wide body caravans.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In most of mainland Europe, touring caravans can be a maximum of 2.5 metres wide. As UK law only permits a trailer of 2.3 metre width for a normal car, we as UK citizens are barred from using these caravans. However, our European cousins are allowed to used these caravans in the UK. I feel this is unfair.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
